_header: As time requireth so men done them use
Subjects: chronicles, verse in; abuses of the age; clergy, criticism/satire of
_description: Reply that men gave, in the time of Godwyn, when others said that bishops should be more concerned with cure of souls than with wealth and pomp, in Part VI of Fabyan’s Chronicle, Part VI, cap. 212, translating Latin verses of which only the beginning is given, preceding it — one stanza rhyme royal
